CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, New York edition, September 7, 1940, pg. 5, reads: "Above is the family of Sergeant Charles Simpson of the 76th Regiment, stationed at Fort Bragg, N. C. All 11 of the children were born and reared in Army.  At the left is Mrs. Simpson, mother of the 'young army.' She was born in the Philippine Islands. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Sergeant Charles Simpson family with ten children and their mother on the left, in front of house on brick columns, Fort Bragg, North Carolina
CatSubject_tab: Family--North Carolina--Fort Bragg.Women--North Carolina--Fort Bragg.Children--North Carolina--Fort Bragg.Group portraits--North Carolina--Fort Bragg.
